section.name: Apache Harmony Mailling Lists
section.p: There are currently three publicly available mailing lists for Geronimo:

subsection.name: Developer Mailing List
subsection.p: The developer mailing list is used by the developers to discuss plans, make decisions, vote on technical issues, etc. It also gets change notices whenever issues are added to or updated in JIRA. This list has a higher volume, though some conversations take place on IRC as well.

subsection.name: Source Control Mailing List
subsection.p: This list receives notifications (with diffs) every time a change is committed to the Harmony source tree. It also receives change notices for changes to the Harmony Wiki.

subsection.name: Other Mailing Lists
subsection.p: The Harmony PMC has a mailing list to resolve any administrative issues, This list is limited to PMC members (most committers on the project).
